title: Zac's E - Elastic Slingshot - Bug or intended?
body: When you mouse over Zac's E - Elastic Slingshot, It doesn't show its maximum range like it used to but instead shows the minimum range. Was this an accidental bug? Or was it intended in a patch and didn't get a mention?

replies.body: but they've always shown minimum range, just like graves' E and olafs Q
It happened 2 patches ago. Quite a lot of people have complained about it. I have not seen any official response to the problem though unfortunately.
